programme.title: 3 Days to Kill
programme.desc: A dying Secret Service agent (Kevin Costner) who wants to reconnect with his estranged daughter (Hailee Steinfeld) is offered a potentially lifesaving drug in exchange for completing one final mission.

programme.title: Acts of Vengeance
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

programme.title: Drive Angry 3D
programme.desc: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: As rioting rocks Los Angeles in the year 2028, an arms dealer, a French assassin, disgruntled thieves and an injured cop make their way to Hotel Artemis -- a members-only hospital for criminals that's operated by a high-tech healer called the Nurse.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: An unknown caller first harasses then murders a group of sorority sisters (Katie Cassidy, Mary Elizabeth Winstead, Lacey Chabert) during a holiday break.

programme.title: Vampiro Unleashed
programme.desc: Vampiro and his guest, Mariana Da Silva, speak about the importance of learning about LatinX culture and history through watching and studying LatinX films.

programme.title: Knock Off
programme.desc: Hong Kong business partners (Jean-Claude Van Damme, Rob Schneider) tangle with villains smuggling miniature explosive devices.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Police Detective Reno Raines is framed for murder and turns bounty hunter to find the people responsible.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno comes to the aid of a town bully, only to have the man return the favor by alerting authorities to Reno's whereabouts.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A contract killer seeking revenge on a judge may provide Reno with clues to the identity of the people who set him up for murder.

programme.title: Fled
programme.desc: Escaped convicts (Laurence Fishburne, Stephen Baldwin) fight while they evade authorities seeking a computer disk on Cuban mobsters.

programme.title: Firewalker
programme.desc: Two guys (Chuck Norris, Louis Gossett Jr.) and a girl (Melody Anderson) brave jungle hazards to find an Aztec temple filled with gold.

programme.title: Masters of the Universe
programme.desc: Warrior He-Man (Dolph Lundgren) and his sidekicks seek a cosmic key to free a sorceress from Skeletor (Frank Langella).

programme.title: Drive Angry 3D
programme.desc: A vengeful father escapes from hell and chases after the men who killed his daughter and kidnapped his granddaughter.

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: A hitman who's in Bangkok to pull off a series of jobs violates his personal code when he falls for a local woman and bonds with his errand boy.

programme.title: Bent
programme.desc: A discredited former cop connects a murder case to an elaborate conspiracy involving high-stakes treason.
